projects.title: FPGA Image Convolution Tool
projects.description: Designed an image convolution tool to pass multiple filters over a 512x512 image using SystemVerilog

projects.title: Maze Router EDA Tool
projects.description: Developed a Maze Router EDA Tool for use on a planar switch-block architecture using C++ based on a modified Lee's algorithm to minimize the amount of wire segments used. Designed a GUI using the EZGL library.

projects.title: RISC-V Processor
projects.description: Designed and implemented a RISC-V based processor via Register Transfer Language VHDL including concepts such as pipelining, hazard control, and direct memory access (DMA). Synthesizable through Quartus II onto an Altera DE-2 Cyclone II development board.

projects.title: Formula 1 lap-by-lap prediction model
projects.description: Developed a machine learning neural network using Python and the TensorFlow Keras API to predict lap times and results after each lap, with ongoing efforts to reduce loss of the LSTM RNN.

projects.title: Keypad System
projects.description: A Keypad system centered around the ARM Cortex M4-based STM32F407 Microcontroller with a servo motor used to control the locking mechanism. The actual keypad interface is implemented using React to allow accessibility on multiple devices. In order to interface between the two, a Flask API is used to both control access as well as keep logs of who accesses the system.

projects.title: Solar Array IDP
projects.description: Developed a real-time system for the distribution panel in a solar array control system as part of a school project under an NDA.

projects.title: Proof-of-Purchase (POP) Code
projects.description: Point of sale system which included an environmentally friendly alternative to paper receipts. Receipt legitimacy is verified by comparing a smart contract on the Ethereum blockchain against an SQL Database.
